text: Janine Turner (born Janine Loraine Gauntt; December 6, 1962) is an American movie and television actress. She starred in the television drama Northern Exposure (which started in 1990 and ended in 1995) and in the movies Steel Magnolias and Cliffhanger. She was born in Lincoln, Nebraska. ==Filmography== ===Films=== Year Title Role Notes 1982 Young Doctors in Love 1986 Knights of the City Brooke 1986 Tai-Pan Shevaun Tillman 1988 Monkey Shines Linda
